About this item

  • Designed with a Certified Hand Therapist! These therapeutic gloves ease the aches and swelling of arthritis or injury with a gentle and even compression while keeping irritating seams away from tender areas
  • Moderate Compression level of approximately 23 to 32mm HG pressure
  • Latex free
  • Gloves can be worn day or night
  • Left, X-Small, Full finger, individual glove

Description

These isotoner Compression Gloves are a comfortable option for anyone that needs moderate compression approximately 23-32 mmHG. This tailored glove is designed so the seams are on the outside for increased comfort and to help patients with edema or similar conditions. Also, the gloves are made of a latex free synthetic nylon and spandex material to feel soft and smooth against your skin.

From the manufacturer

isotoner Therapeutic Compression Gloves

With Isotoner, Every Pair Cares

For over one hundred years, Isotoner has proudly cared for those who value comfort above all else. But we know, to be truly comfortable, you need both your mind and body at ease. So now, were making the planet a more comfortable place to live by utilizing cleaner chemistry to protect water systems, using recycled and upcycled fabrics that clean up landfills, and sourcing materials that help clean the environment. All this, without sacrificing the comfort and style you know and expect.

These Isotoner Compression Gloves are a comfortable option for anyone that needs moderate compression--approximately 23-32 mmHg. Available in both Finger less and full hand gloves.

  • These therapeutic gloves ease the aches and swelling of arthritis or injury with a gentle and even compression
  • Moderate Compression level of approximately 23 to 32mm HG pressure
  • Designed so the seams are on the outside for increased comfort
  • Covers hand and wrist for comfort and support
  • Care: Hand wash cool water. No bleach. Dry flat away from heat
  • Unisex design with sizes from X Small up to Large


Fingerless Therapeutic Compression

Fingerless Compression Gloves are a comfortable option for anyone that needs compression while still having access to a phone or tablet.



Full Finger Therapeutic Compression

Full Finger Compression Gloves are a comfortable option for anyone that needs compression throughout your entire finger.

Customers say

Customers find these gloves effective for pain relief, particularly for arthritic thumb joints, and appreciate their soft fabric that provides gentle wrist massage. The gloves receive positive feedback for their compression, quality, and functionality, with customers noting they work better than arthritis drugs. The fit and durability receive mixed reviews - while some say they fit well and will last, others find them too tight and prone to fraying. The seam quality is also mixed, with some finding them durable while others report issues with seams coming undone.

    I do a lot of handwriting every day. I'm right handed, but I wear gloves on both hands. These gloves have been a life saver! First, they protect my pinky from rubbing against the paper when I write. Second, they help my hand to stay still and firm, instead of feeling loose all over the page. And I find that my fingers don't tire as easily when I'm wearing these gloves. The compression definitely works on my arthritic hands!

    Each glove has the Isotoner brand name on the bottom of the glove. The exterior stitching means they feel seamless on my fingers. I don't know who thought of this but they're brilliant! No stitching to rub against my fingers. And the material is nice and stretchy, I have complete mobility wearing these gloves. They're so comfortable that I literally have to remember to take them off when I'm not writing.

  • Dahlia
    5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
    Excellent, but order a size down for the best compression
    Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2015
    Color: CamelSize: X-SmallStyle: One Pair of Open Finger Gloves
    I was unsure about giving these gloves 4 or 5 stars only because I'm not sure how long they'll hold up (I've only had them for a few weeks and they are already showing more wear than expected since I primarily wear them at night in bed), but I decided on five... See more
    I was unsure about giving these gloves 4 or 5 stars only because I'm not sure how long they'll hold up (I've only had them for a few weeks and they are already showing more wear than expected since I primarily wear them at night in bed), but I decided on five stars because they really do work and they have helped me tremendously. I broke my right hand two months ago and when the cast came off, my hand was so swollen and painful I could barely move it. I've broken bones before but the swelling this time was truly awful. On top of that, I've had some serious carpal tunnel issues in recent months in my left hand.

    For my broken hand, the orthopedic surgeon told me to expect pain and swelling for many months (like 6-12) but these gloves have made a HUGE difference. With the reduction in swelling, I've been able to use my hand much more easily (kinda hard to do much with a swollen mit and sausage fingers) which has enabled me to regain strength and flexibility far more quickly than I ever could have otherwise. For that alone these gloves deserve ten stars. Then using the other glove under my carpal tunnel wrist brace at night has ended that last little bit of pain/numbness. The brace alone was working great, but combined with the compression glove, my hand and wrist actually feel normal again.

    My only recommendation is to order a size down. I measure as a size S but ordered the XS just to make sure there was enough compression. The XS has been perfect. Overall, these gloves are very soft, comfortable, and provide a perfect level of compression (if you get the right size). Even if I have to replace them in a few months, they have been worth every penny for the relief they've provided. I am so glad to have found them!
